ygData.subject: script to check out cantera by anonymous cvs
ygData.msgSnippet: I have put a small shell script to check out Cantera using anonymous CVS at http://blue.caltech.edu/~dgg/get_cantera.sh All you need to do is save this script

I have put a small shell script to check out Cantera using anonymous  
CVS at http://blue.caltech.edu/~dgg/get_cantera.sh

All you need to do is save this script to your disk, open a shell  
window and type:

sh get_cantera.sh

This will get the latest Cantera source code and put in a directory  
"cantera" located within the directory where you give the command.  
This should work on any linux./unix/Mac/cygwin system that has "sh".
